document.heading: Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-222, the “Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-829. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 2, 2012, and Oct. 16, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Nov. 2, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-524 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-222 became effective on Mar. 5, 2013.
